original_text:
“Thus he said: ‘As for the fourth beast,
there shall be a fourth kingdom on earth,
    which shall be different from all the kingdoms,
and it shall devour the whole earth,
    and trample it down, and break it to pieces.
korean_text: 모신 자가 이처럼 이르되 넷째 짐승은 곧 땅의 넷째 나라인데 이는 다른 나라들과는 달라서 온 천하를 삼키고 밟아 부서뜨릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: there shall be a fourth kingdom on earth,
sentences.korean_translation: 땅에 네 번째 왕국이 일어날 것이며,

sentences.original_text: which shall be different from all the kingdoms,
and it shall devour the whole earth,
